message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects its true value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is too low for me to consider. I'm willing to come down slightly to $13,500.  Let me know if this works for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've considered it carefully, and I'm willing to go up to $12,500 for the product. I hope this is within your acceptable range.
